project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement function to load CSV file and extract numerical columns specified by the user
Implement function to calculate the mean for the selected numerical columns
Implement function to calculate the median for the selected numerical columns
Implement function to calculate the mode for the selected numerical columns
Implement user interface to allow the user to select columns and display results
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
